import React from "react"; function Rating(props) { const { rating, numReviews } = props; return (
= 1 ? "fas fa-star" : rating >= 0.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } > 10 reviews = 2 ? "fas fa-star" : rating >= 1.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } > 10 reviews = 3 ? "fas fa-star" : rating >= 2.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } > 14 reviews = 4 ? "fas fa-star" : rating >= 3.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } > 10 reviews = 5 ? "fas fa-star" : rating >= 4.5 ? "fas fa-star-half-alt" : "far fa-star" } >
); } export default Rating;
